titleStmt.title: Ieremiahs teares, or A sermon preached in York-minster vpon Trinity Sunday, in the yeare of our Lord, 1604 when the sicknes was begunne in the cittie. By Thomas Pullein vicar of Pontefract, sometime chaplaine of New Colledge in Oxford.
Jeremiahs teares.
titleStmt.author: Pullein, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iaggard, for Clement Knight,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
